message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you a product that I believe will greatly benefit you. Given its immense value, I'm initially proposing a price of $1,300,000.  This is a unique opportunity to acquire something truly special.
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of the product, but my budget is limited. I am willing to pay up to $950,000 for the product. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.

Bob, I appreciate your offer, and I understand your budget considerations.  However, the value of this product is substantial, and I'm confident it will exceed your expectations. I'm willing to come down to $1,150,000.  I believe this price reflects a fair compromise.

Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. While I understand the value of the product, I must stick to my budget. I am willing to pay up to $1,000,000 for the product. I hope this meets somewhere in between our expectations.
